    question => UTF-8 string (418) "<p>3. Names of the person(s) from the entity involved in the discussion:</p>...
    $value[2]['question']
    <p>3.	Names of the person(s) from the entity involved in the discussion:</p>
<i>This must include a representative from ‘those charged with governance’ (e.g. a director of the company) and management. Whilst for many entities ‘those charged with governance’ will also be ‘management’, where Ac2 identifies that this is not the case, it must be ensured that going concern is discussed with both groups.</i>

    question => UTF-8 string (627) "<p>If the entity has not prepared formal forecasts or similar for a period o...
    $value[4]['question']
    <p>If the entity has not prepared formal forecasts or similar for a period of at least twelve months from the end of the reporting period, document the nature of the client’s assessment of going concern. </p>
<i>This assessment could include:</i>
<ul>
    <li><i>Formal budgets on a rolling quarterly basis looking forward, supported by a more informal assessment of the subsequent period</i></li>
    <li><i>Informal assessment by way of expectations of the level of repeat custom and expenses, timing of significant orders, working capital requirements, significant future ‘one-off’ expenditure etc.</i></li>
</ul>

    question => UTF-8 string (627) "<p>If the entity has not prepared formal forecasts or similar for a period o...
    $value[4]['question']
    <p>If the entity has not prepared formal forecasts or similar for a period of at least twelve months from the end of the reporting period, document the nature of the client’s assessment of going concern. </p>
<i>This assessment could include:</i>
<ul>
    <li><i>Formal budgets on a rolling quarterly basis looking forward, supported by a more informal assessment of the subsequent period</i></li>
    <li><i>Informal assessment by way of expectations of the level of repeat custom and expenses, timing of significant orders, working capital requirements, significant future ‘one-off’ expenditure etc.</i></li>
</ul>

    question => UTF-8 string (418) "<p>3. Names of the person(s) from the entity involved in the discussion:</p>...
    $value[2]['question']
    <p>3.	Names of the person(s) from the entity involved in the discussion:</p>
<i>This must include a representative from ‘those charged with governance’ (e.g. a director of the company) and management. Whilst for many entities ‘those charged with governance’ will also be ‘management’, where Ac2 identifies that this is not the case, it must be ensured that going concern is discussed with both groups.</i>

    <p>If the entity has not prepared formal forecasts or similar for a period of at least twelve months from the end of the reporting period, document the nature of the client’s assessment of going concern. </p>

</ul>

    <p>3.	Names of the person(s) from the entity involved in the discussion:</p>

    $value[4]['question']
    <p>If the entity has not prepared formal forecasts or similar for a period of at least twelve months from the end of the reporting period, document the nature of the client’s assessment of going concern. </p>
<i>This assessment could include:</i>
<ul>
    <li><i>Formal budgets on a rolling quarterly basis looking forward, supported by a more informal assessment of the subsequent period</i></li>
    <li><i>Informal assessment by way of expectations of the level of repeat custom and expenses, timing of significant orders, working capital requirements, significant future ‘one-off’ expenditure etc.</i></li>
</ul>
